column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've tried every single item on their menu
column2: and with the exception of the bone marrow (overhyped) and the baked potato (good
column3: not great) absolutely nothing has disappointed me. Even their crab cake (at a non seafood focused steakhouse) is extraordinary. The aged ribeye is their second best steak offering (behind the bone in filet)
column4: and either of those could go up against any steak out there (including A5 Wagyu) and give it a run for its money. They offer the authentic Au Cheval burger (rated #1 in the US by critics and diners alike) on their menu with their famous bacon (really
column5: pork belly). The mushrooms are the best side I've ever eaten. The truffle Mac n cheese is super rich but outstanding on its own since the truffle is not overbearing.
